name: No Eternity
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Wallow for dead crimson idols
Fall graces of insolent titles
When precipice is all that's splayed
Five feet of rope can't lead the way
[Verse 2]
Boundaries break at the cusp of greats
When a cynical mind meets time's waiting gates
I don't have a call to make to beings afar
'Cause when the sky's all black, there's only one North Star!
[Verse 3]
Where are the gods when the glass breaks a million times?
A shattered aura of faith, unwelcome rhythms and rhymes
Call into question the morrow each day to day
A thousand voices of doubt drive all the pain away
[Verse 4]
And so I wait for the call of unreachable gods
Placed under layer after layer of unspeakable fraud
I don't know what you want with me
But I'm too tired to stick around and see
[Instrumental Break]
[Bridge]
Time is under your spell
Infinite, until it breaks!
Rip my heart into shreds
And burn the pieces
Jealousy, endlessly
Mind of body taken places
[Verse 5]
Boundaries broken by lies of greats
When a cynical mind has no will to wait
I don't have a call to make to beings afar
'Cause when the sky's all black, there's only one North Star!
[Verse 6]
And so the tale's overtaken by the greed and the lust
At least that's what the book says, so take it how you think you must
It's all a fairy tale of love and joy until you're the troll
There's not a single thing I wish for, I have all that I told
[Verse 7]
I don't care to ponder it
I know gods are full of shit
Light they plead is shown in vain
'Cause they don't laugh when they feel pain
